doc.after: With these definitions the continuity equation reads  Either form may be quoted Intuitively the above quantities indicate this represents the flow of probability The chance of finding the particle at some position r and time t flows like a fluid hence the term probability current a vector field The particle itself does not flow deterministically in this vector field
